references.reason: This book is a foundational text in the field of deep learning, providing a comprehensive overview of the subject and its many applications.

references.paper_title: Deep learning in neural networks: An overview
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of deep learning in neural networks, covering various aspects of the technology and its history.

references.paper_title: A closer look at memorization in deep networks
references.reason: This paper offers valuable insights into the phenomenon of memorization in deep learning, a critical issue that can affect model performance and generalization.

references.paper_title: Maximum likelihood estimation of observer error-rates using the em algorithm
references.reason: This seminal paper introduces a robust and widely applicable method for estimating error rates, foundational to many approaches for handling noisy labels.

references.paper_title: Whose vote should count more: Optimal integration of labels from labelers of unknown expertise
references.reason: This paper presents a fundamental approach to integrating labels from multiple annotators of varying expertise, a key element in crowdsourcing and noisy label scenarios.
